Courtside.Description: Exclusive seats at floor level, providing an up-close and personal view of the high-paced action.
Courtside.View_Quality: Unmatched court-level perspective, offering an intense and engaging experience.
Courtside.Unique_Features: Opportunity for direct interaction with players and visibility on live broadcasts.
Courtside.Accessibility: Premier access with some limitations for personal mobility devices.
Courtside.Special_Perks: Access to VIP lounges, complimentary premium dining options, and personal service.

Club_Seats.Description: Elevated side-line views with premium amenities, combining comfort with an exceptional viewing experience.
Club_Seats.View_Quality: Optimal side views ensuring a full perspective of the game.
Club_Seats.Unique_Features: Extra comfort with spacious seating and exclusive access areas.
Club_Seats.Accessibility: Easy entrance with dedicated access, close to elevators for convenience.
Club_Seats.Special_Perks: Admittance to private clubs, superior dining experiences, and in-seat service.

Skybox.Description: Private viewing suites offering a luxurious and intimate setting for watching the game.
Skybox.View_Quality: Elevated and private viewing experience with panoramic views of the entire arena.
Skybox.Unique_Features: Suites equipped with luxury seating, exclusive catering options, and personal attendant service.
Skybox.Accessibility: VIP entrance with private elevators, ensuring seamless access.
Skybox.Special_Perks: Highest level of comfort and exclusivity, with access to premium clubs and priority booking for events.

Upper_Level.Description: A more economical choice offering a bird's-eye view of the game, capturing the atmosphere of the arena.
Upper_Level.View_Quality: Wide-angle view from above, ideal for fans who enjoy seeing game formations.
Upper_Level.Unique_Features: An accessible way to be part of the excitement with the Heat community.
Upper_Level.Accessibility: Accessible seating options available, with escalators and elevators to upper levels.
Upper_Level.Special_Perks: Cost-effective, perfect for enjoying the game with family and friends.

restaurants_bars.name: Bayside Marketplace
restaurants_bars.description: A large waterfront shopping center with a variety of dining options, live music, and boat tours, located within walking distance from FTX Arena.

restaurants_bars.name: American Social
restaurants_bars.description: A lively sports bar offering American fare, craft beers, and waterfront views, a short drive from FTX Arena.

restaurants_bars.name: The Wharf Miami
restaurants_bars.address: 114 SW North River Dr, Miami, FL 33130
restaurants_bars.description: An open-air venue by the Miami River with food, cocktails, and a vibrant atmosphere, ideal for pre-game and post-game gatherings.

restaurants_bars.name: Casa Tua Cucina
restaurants_bars.description: An upscale Italian market and restaurant offering a variety of gourmet dishes and wines, perfect for a luxurious pre-game meal.

restaurants_bars.name: Komodo
restaurants_bars.description: A trendy three-story lounge and restaurant that blends Southeast Asian cuisine with a South Florida vibe, ideal for fans looking to dine in style.

restaurants_bars.name: Batch Gastropub
restaurants_bars.description: A popular gastropub offering a wide selection of craft beers, cocktails, and hearty American dishes, with plenty of screens to catch up on pre-game shows.

restaurants_bars.name: Blackbird Ordinary
restaurants_bars.description: Known for its creative cocktails and lively atmosphere, this bar is a great spot for Heat fans to gather before heading to the arena.

accommodations.name: Holiday Inn Port of Miami-Downtown
accommodations.description: A comfortable hotel offering scenic views of Biscayne Bay and the Miami skyline, conveniently located across from FTX Arena.

accommodations.name: InterContinental Miami
accommodations.description: A luxury hotel featuring modern rooms, a spa, and dining options, situated a short distance from FTX Arena with views of Biscayne Bay.

accommodations.name: Kimpton EPIC Hotel
accommodations.description: This upscale hotel offers stunning views of the city and water, a rooftop pool, and luxury amenities, located within walking distance to the arena.

accommodations.name: YVE Hotel Miami
accommodations.description: A boutique hotel with modern, bright rooms, located in the heart of downtown Miami, offering easy access to FTX Arena.

accommodations.name: JW Marriott Marquis Miami
accommodations.description: This luxury hotel features high-end accommodations, a pool, spa, and several dining options, just a short distance from the arena.

accommodations.name: Hilton Miami Downtown
accommodations.description: Offering panoramic views of Biscayne Bay and the city, this hotel is known for its comfortable rooms and proximity to FTX Arena.

tourist_attractions.name: Pérez Art Museum Miami
tourist_attractions.description: Contemporary art museum showcasing international art of the 20th and 21st centuries, located near FTX Arena.

tourist_attractions.name: Phillip and Patricia Frost Museum of Science
tourist_attractions.description: A state-of-the-art museum featuring a planetarium, aquarium, and interactive exhibits, adjacent to the Pérez Art Museum Miami.

tourist_attractions.name: Bayfront Park
tourist_attractions.description: A sprawling green space offering scenic views of Biscayne Bay, live events, and a range of outdoor activities, located near FTX Arena.

tourist_attractions.name: Miami Children's Museum
tourist_attractions.description: An interactive museum designed for children, featuring educational exhibits and activities, located on Watson Island.

tourist_attractions.name: Jungle Island
tourist_attractions.description: An eco-adventure park offering animal encounters, zip lines, and a tropical atmosphere, situated on Watson Island.

tourist_attractions.name: Wynwood Walls
tourist_attractions.description: An outdoor museum showcasing large-scale works by some of the world’s best-known street artists, located in the vibrant Wynwood neighborhood.

tourist_attractions.name: Vizcaya Museum and Gardens
tourist_attractions.description: A National Historic Landmark featuring a stunning Italian Renaissance-style villa, beautiful gardens, and art collections, located in Coconut Grove.

team_related_activities.name: Miami Heat Store at Kaseya Center
team_related_activities.description: Official store for Miami Heat merchandise, offering a wide selection of gear located within the FTX Arena.

options.description: A convenient, free automated people mover system with multiple stops in downtown Miami, including near FTX Arena. It's a great option for getting around the downtown area without a car.

Miami's elevated rapid transit system connects the city to key areas, including the suburbs. For fans coming from outside downtown, the MetroRail offers a seamless connection to the Metromover at Government Center station.
A high-speed train service connecting Miami with Fort Lauderdale and West Palm Beach. The MiamiCentral station is just a short Metromover ride away from FTX Arena.
Miami-Dade County's bus service offers extensive routes covering the greater Miami area, with several lines stopping near FTX Arena.

best_places_to_buy.name: Official Team Website
best_places_to_buy.description: The safest option for purchasing tickets, directly from the team's official site ensures authenticity and access to exclusive deals.

best_places_to_buy.name: Ticketmaster
best_places_to_buy.description: As the official ticketing partner of the NBA, Ticketmaster provides a secure platform for buying authentic tickets to Heat games.

best_places_to_buy.name: StubHub
best_places_to_buy.description: A trusted secondary marketplace for fans to buy and sell tickets. StubHub guarantees the authenticity of tickets and offers protection policies.

best_places_to_buy.name: SeatGeek
best_places_to_buy.description: Another reputable secondary ticketing marketplace that aggregates listings from various sources, offering a wide selection of seating options and prices.

ticket_purchasing_tips.ways_to_save: Buying tickets during the mid-week can often be cheaper than weekend games. Group ticket discounts often apply for groups of 10 or more. Some games may have last-minute ticket sales closer to the game day.
ticket_purchasing_tips.avoiding_scalpers: Always buy tickets from verified sources to avoid scams. If buying on the secondary market, ensure the website offers buyer guarantee. Avoid buying printed tickets from individuals on site as these can be duplicates or forgeries.
